attributes.action: See sense and understand comedy, the BBC has gone too far
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Russell Brand and Jonathon Ross suspended, the BBC has now gone too far in censorship of comedy and freedom of speech. Far more people in the UK have a problem with this issue than the matter of a silly prank call made by two comedians ... important word there, comedians. As for the matter of my TV license money going towards their salaries ... what about Dr Who? I dont want to pay for that mess of a TV show. Point made.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
